products.productTitle: ORGANIC NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED SMOKED BACON
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: ORGANIC PORK, WATER, VINEGAR (MADE WITH ORGANIC INGREDIENTS), SALT, CELERY POWDER.
products.productDescription: Our Organic No Sugar Added Uncured Smoked Bacon is made from pork that is humanely raised without the use of antibiotics or growth stimulants and fed no animal by-products. Minimally processed, no preservatives, no added nitrates or nitrites, no gluten, no lactose, no MSG, and NO sweeteners!

products.productTitle: UNCURED HICKORY SMOKED BACON
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, BROWN SUGAR, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT, VINEGAR, CELERY POWDER.
products.productDescription: We’re famous for bacon, and our all natural, pork bacon started it all! Never injected and always smoked over real wood chips, our bacon is made the good on’ fashioned way. No nonsense, just natural. It’s the natural flavors created by the real hickory wood chips that will keep you coming back for more.

products.productTitle: UNCURED HICKORY SMOKED PEPPER BACON
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, BROWN SUGAR, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT, PEPPER, VINEGAR, CELERY POWDER.
products.productDescription: We’re famous for bacon, and our all natural, pork bacon started it all! Never injected and smoked over real wood chips, our bacon is made the good on’ fashioned way. No nonsense, just natural.  Our Uncured Hickory Smoked Pepper Bacon is smoked with real hickory wood chips and rolled in pepper. If you like a little bit of spice, this bacon is great for you.

products.productTitle: UNCURED APPLEWOOD SMOKED BACON - NON GMO PROJECT VERIFIED
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, BROWN SUGAR, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT, VINEGAR, NATURAL FLAVORS (MEDITERRANEAN SPICE EXTRACTIVES).
products.productDescription: You know the phrase, “an apple a day keeps the doctor away…” Okay, well maybe not quite the same, but we can guarantee our Apple Smoked Bacon will keep you wanting it every day! It’s smoked with natural smoke, giving it that signature, smoky, and simple Pederson’s flavor. It’s thick-cut to ensure a perfect bacon experience leaving you with a taste that’s unforgettable and lingers like smoke in the wind.

products.productTitle: UNCURED BEEF BACON
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: BEEF, WATER, BROWN SUGAR, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT, VINEGAR, CELERY POWDER.
products.productDescription: We think you might be surprised to find out that our beef bacon is the leanest of our bacon selection. Yes, it’s even leaner than our turkey alternative! As with all of our bacon, it’s packed with flavor and the Pederson’s quality you’ve come to expect.

products.productTitle: UNCURED APPLEWOOD SMOKED BACON
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, BROWN SUGAR, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT, VINEGAR, CITRUS EXTRACTS, POMEGRANATE EXTRACT, ROSEMARY EXTRACT.
products.productDescription: You know the phrase, “an apple a day keeps the doctor away…” Okay, well maybe not quite the same, but we can guarantee our Applewood Smoked Bacon will keep you wanting it every day! It’s smoked with natural smoke, giving it that signature, smoky, and simple Pederson’s flavor. It’s thick-cut to ensure a perfect bacon experience leaving you with a taste that’s unforgettable and lingers like smoke in the wind.

products.productTitle: UNCURED CHERRY SMOKED BACON
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, BROWN SUGAR, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT, VINEGAR, CELERY POWDER.
products.productDescription: Smoked over real wood chips, our Uncured Cherry Smoked Bacon is made the good ol’ fashioned way.  No nonsense, just natural.  Taste the sweetness of cherry smoke in every bite!

products.productTitle: UNCURED NO SUGAR HICKORY SMOKED BACON
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT, VINEGAR, CITRUS EXTRACTS, POMEGRANATE EXTRACT, ROSEMARY EXTRACT.
products.productDescription: Yes, you read that right! A sugar free bacon that is Whole 30 Approved and available nationwide in your local grocery stores! And, it’s the same Pederson’s quality that you’ve grown to love. Our pork is humanely raised without the use of antibiotics or growth stimulants and fed no animal by-products. Minimally processed, no artificial ingredients, no preservatives, no added nitrates or nitrites, no gluten, no lactose, no MSG, and NO added sweeteners!

products.productTitle: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED SMOKED BACON - NON GMO PROJECT VERIFIED
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT, VINEGAR, CITRUS EXTRACTS, POMEGRANATE EXTRACT, ROSEMARY EXTRACT.
products.productDescription: Our Smoked Uncured Bacon is made from pork that is humanely raised. Minimally processed, no preservatives, no artificial ingredients, no added nitrates or nitrites, no gluten, no lactose, no MSG, no added sweeteners, and Non GMO Project Verified!

products.productTitle: ORGANIC UNCURED APPLE SMOKED BACON
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: ORGANIC PORK, WATER, ORGANIC BROWN SUGAR, HOMESTYLE VINEGAR FLAVOR (CONTAINING ORGANIC VINEGAR, SODIUM BICARBONATE, POTASSIUM CARBONATE), SALT, CELERY POWDER.
products.productDescription: Real food starts with real farmers. We work with self-sustaining family farms because they’re good stewards of their land, and they feel the ethical obligation to provide their pigs with a comfortable life. Not only do they raise their pigs right, but they also grow much of the grain used to feed those pigs. It allows for a higher quality, well monitored feed free of animal by-products. They are housed in open pens with outdoor access allowing them to romp, frolic, and engage in natural behavior. With no growth hormones or antibiotics, our pigs grow slower than those at industrial “farms,” and we’re quite alright with that. It’s a better life for the pigs and produces the best pork we’ve ever eaten.

products.ingredientsText:
INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, DEHYDRATED BLUEBERRIES (SUGAR, SUNFLOWER OIL), VINEGAR, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT,
SPICES (GINGER, NUTMEG, SAGE, BLACK PEPPER, RED PEPPER), NATURAL MAPLE POWDER, MAPLE SYRUP, CELERY POWDER.

These Blueberry Maple Sausage Patties are minimally processed with no preservatives, no artificial ingredients, no added nitrates or nitrites, no gluten, no lactose, and no MSG!

products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, SALT, SPICES (RED & BLACK PEPPERS, SAGE, GINGER, NUTMEG, SPICE EXTRACTIVE [CAPSICUM]), VINEGAR
products.productDescription: We might be biased, but we think our No Sugar Spicy Breakfast Sausage is the best on the market! We’d even go so far as to say that this breakfast sausage makes Monday mornings bearable. Okay, okay… that and coffee. Seasoned to perfection, it’s definitely the best part of waking up. Paleo friendly and Whole30 Approved.

products.productTitle: NO SUGAR CHORIZO
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, SPICES (BLACK PEPPER, CHILI PEPPER, OREGANO, RED PEPPER), SALT, TAPIOCA STARCH, PAPRIKA, DEHYDRATED GARLIC, WATER, LESS THAN 2% OF: VINEGAR, CELERY POWDER
products.productDescription: Need a little spice in your life? Our Whole30 Approved No Sugar Chorizo Sausage is like a fiesta in your mouth! Bold, flavorful, and packing a punch, our Chorizo Sausage is versatile enough to get you through breakfast, brunch, lunch, snacks, and supper. Stuff a pepper, top a pizza, or scramble it with eggs.

products.productDescription: Our No Sugar Added Uncured Hot Dogs Made With Pork & Uncured Bacon are packed with an unexpected punch of flavor! Made with Pederson’s famous No Sugar Bacon, these hot dogs are sure to be a mealtime star in your home! Minimally processed, no artificial ingredients, no preservatives, no added nitrates or nitrites, and NO sweeteners!

products.productTitle: ORGANIC NO SUGAR ADDED SMOKED SAUSAGE

products.productDescription: We might be biased, but we think our Breakfast Sausage is the best on the market! We’d even go so far as to say that this breakfast sausage makes Monday mornings bearable. Okay, okay… that and coffee. Seasoned to perfection, it’s definitely the best part of waking up.

products.productDescription: Ey, how you doin’? We’re pretty sure you’re going to be much better after getting your hands on our Whole30 Approved No Sugar Italian Ground Sausage. Bada bing, bada boom, do we have a treat for you! Bold, fresh, and full of flavor, we’re confident you won’t be able to fuggedaboutit once you’ve tried it. Capiche?

products.productTitle: NO SUGAR UNCURED BEEF HOT DOGS
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: BEEF, WATER, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT, VINEGAR, CELERY POWDER, TAPIOCA STARCH, POTATO STARCH, NATURAL SPICES (INCLUDING PAPRIKA), NATURAL FLAVORS.
products.productDescription: Let’s be frank, hot dogs are the perfect meal for everyone. Kids love them, dads love to grill them, and, now, moms love the fact that they can feel good about feeding their families our all natural, 100% beef hot dogs because they contain NO ADDED SUGAR! These Whole 30 Compliant No Sugar Hot Dogs are quick and easy to prepare and give you the perfect emergency protein boost you’re looking for! Paleo friendly and Whole30 Approved.

products.productTitle: UNCURED NO SUGAR BONELESS HAM HALF - SPIRAL SLICED
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, VINEGAR, LESS THAN 2% OF: SEASONING (NATURAL SPICE EXTRACTIVES [INCLUDING CHILI PEPPERS, NATURAL FLAVORS]), CELERY POWDER, SALT INCLUDING SEA SALT.
products.productDescription: Sing it with me, now, “I like pig butts, and I cannot lie!” Okay, okay… we’ll stop hamming around! Our Uncured No Sugar Boneless Half Ham is about to revolutionize your holidays. It’s the same superior taste and quality that you’ve come to expect from Pederson’s Natural Farms and their No Sugar Line. Spiral Sliced. Boneless. Average weight is 4-6 lbs. Fully cooked.

products.productTitle: ORGANIC UNCURED SMOKED BONE-IN HAM HALF

Average weight is 4-6 lbs. Fully cooked.

products.productDescription: Sing it with me, now, “I like pig butts, and I cannot lie!” Okay, okay… we’ll stop hamming around! Most importantly, it’s the same superior taste and quality that you’ve come to expect from Pederson’s Natural Farms and their No Sugar Line. Average weight is 6-8 lbs.

products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: ORGANIC BEEF.
products.productDescription: Ground beef doesn’t get any better than this! 100% Grass-Fed, Organic, and Non-GMO, this ground beef is about as natural as it comes. 85% Lean, 15% Fat. 16oz.

products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: BISON.

products.productTitle: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED SMOKED BACON - NON GMO PROJECT VERIFIED
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT, VINEGAR, CITRUS EXTRACTS, POMEGRANATE EXTRACT, ROSEMARY EXTRACT.
products.productDescription: Our Smoked Uncured Bacon is made from pork that is humanely raised. Minimally processed, no preservatives, no artificial ingredients, no added nitrates or nitrites, no gluten, no lactose, no MSG, no added sweeteners, and Non GMO Project Verified!

products.productTitle: NO SUGAR ADDED DOUBLE SMOKED BRATWURST
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, VINEGAR, LESS THAN 2% OF: MACE, WHITE PEPPER, NUTMEG, CULTURED CELERY POWDER AND SEA SALT, GINGER.
products.productDescription: Our all natural, fully cooked sausage link line offers a taste for every palate! Convenient with uncompromised quality and flavor, we know you’ll love it!

products.productTitle: UNCURED NO SUGAR ADDED OLD WORLD KIELBASA
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, VINEGAR, SALT, LESS THAN 2% OF: WHITE PEPPER, CORIANDER, NUTMEG, GARLIC, CELERY POWDER.
products.productDescription: You asked for it, so you shall receive! Introducing our newest addition to our sausage family. Our Uncured No Sugar Added Old World Kielbasa is mild, kid tasted, and kid approved! With a more traditional kielbasa flavor profile, this product is sure to be a crowd pleaser.

products.productTitle: NO SUGAR ADDED SMOKED SAUSAGE - NON GMO PROJECT VERIFIED
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, SPICES (BLACK PEPPER, CELERY SEED, CORIANDER), VINEGAR, CULTURED CELERY POWDER, SEA SALT.
products.productDescription: Our Non GMO No Sugar Added Smoked Sausage is made from pork that is humanely raised without the use of antibiotics or growth stimulants and fed no animal by-products. Minimally processed, no preservatives, no artificial ingredients, no added nitrates or nitrites, no gluten, no lactose, no MSG, and no sweeteners!

products.productTitle: NO SUGAR SPICY BREAKFAST SAUSAGE
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, SALT, SPICES (RED & BLACK PEPPERS, SAGE, GINGER, NUTMEG, SPICE EXTRACTIVE [CAPSICUM]), VINEGAR
products.productDescription: We might be biased, but we think our No Sugar Spicy Breakfast Sausage is the best on the market! We’d even go so far as to say that this breakfast sausage makes Monday mornings bearable. Okay, okay… that and coffee. Seasoned to perfection, it’s definitely the best part of waking up. Paleo friendly and Whole30 Approved.

products.productTitle: NO SUGAR CHORIZO
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, SPICES (BLACK PEPPER, CHILI PEPPER, OREGANO, RED PEPPER), SALT, TAPIOCA STARCH, PAPRIKA, DEHYDRATED GARLIC, WATER, LESS THAN 2% OF: VINEGAR, CELERY POWDER
products.productDescription: Need a little spice in your life? Our Whole30 Approved No Sugar Chorizo Sausage is like a fiesta in your mouth! Bold, flavorful, and packing a punch, our Chorizo Sausage is versatile enough to get you through breakfast, brunch, lunch, snacks, and supper. Stuff a pepper, top a pizza, or scramble it with eggs.

products.productTitle: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED HOT DOGS MADE WITH PORK AND UNCURED BACON
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, UNCURED SMOKED BACON (PORK, WATER, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT, VINEGAR, CITRUS EXTRACTS, POMEGRANATE EXTRACT, ROSEMARY EXTRACT), WATER, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT (INCLUDING SEA SALT), VINEGAR, SPICES (PAPRIKA, [GRANULATED WHITE PEPPER, ONION, GARLIC, NUTMEG, CORIANDER]), MUSTARD, CULTURED CELERY POWDER.
products.productDescription: Our No Sugar Added Uncured Hot Dogs Made With Pork & Uncured Bacon are packed with an unexpected punch of flavor! Made with Pederson’s famous No Sugar Bacon, these hot dogs are sure to be a mealtime star in your home! Minimally processed, no artificial ingredients, no preservatives, no added nitrates or nitrites, and NO sweeteners!

products.productTitle: UNCURED NO SUGAR BONE IN HAM HALF - SPIRAL SLICED
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, VINEGAR, LESS THAN 2% OF: SEASONING (NATURAL SPICE EXTRACTIVES [INCLUDING CHILI PEPPERS, NATURAL FLAVORS]), CELERY POWDER, SALT INCLUDING SEA SALT.
products.productDescription: Sing it with me, now, “I like pig butts, and I cannot lie!” Okay, okay… we’ll stop hamming around! Our Uncured No Sugar Bone In Spiral Sliced Ham is about to revolutionize your holidays. Most importantly, it’s the same superior taste and quality that you’ve come to expect from Pederson’s Natural Farms and their No Sugar Line. Average weight is 6-8 lbs.

products.productTitle: FULLY COOKED MILD BREAKFAST SAUSAGE LINKS
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, LESS THAN 2% OF: VINEGAR, SALT, SPICES (GINGER, NUTMEG, SAGE, BLACK PEPPER, RED PEPPER).
products.productDescription: Our NEW Fully Cooked Breakfast Links and Patties are made from pork that is humanely raised without the use of antibiotics or growth stimulants and fed no animal by-products. These Mild Breakfast Sausage Links are minimally processed with no preservatives, no artificial ingredients, no added nitrates or nitrites, no gluten, no lactose, and no MSG! Whole30 Approved.

products.productTitle: FULLY COOKED SPICY BREAKFAST SAUSAGE LINKS
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, LESS THAN 2% OF: VINEGAR, SALT, SPICES (RED & BLACK PEPPERS, SAGE, GINGER, NUTMEG, SPICE EXTRACTIVE [CAPSICUM]).
products.productDescription: Our NEW Fully Cooked Breakfast Links and Patties are made from pork that is humanely raised without the use of antibiotics or growth stimulants and fed no animal by-products. These Spicy Breakfast Sausage Links are minimally processed with no preservatives, no artificial ingredients, no added nitrates or nitrites, no gluten, no lactose, and no MSG! Whole30 Approved.

products.productTitle: ORGANIC GROUND BEEF

products.productDescription: Ground beef doesn’t get any better than this! 100% Grass-Fed, Organic, and Non-GMO, this ground beef is about as natural as it comes. 85% Lean, 15% Fat. 16oz.

products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT, VINEGAR, CITRUS EXTRACTS, POMEGRANATE EXTRACT, ROSEMARY EXTRACT.
products.productDescription: Yes, you read that right! A sugar free bacon that is Whole 30 Approved and available nationwide in your local grocery stores! And, it’s the same Pederson’s quality that you’ve grown to love. Our pork is humanely raised without the use of antibiotics or growth stimulants and fed no animal by-products. Minimally processed, no artificial ingredients, no preservatives, no added nitrates or nitrites, no gluten, no lactose, no MSG, and NO added sweeteners!

products.productDescription: Our all natural, fully cooked sausage link line offers a taste for every palate! Convenient with uncompromised quality and flavor, we know you’ll love it!

products.productDescription: Some days just call for a simple, quick, and delicious meal. Our Whole30 Approved Uncured No Sugar Smoked Kielbasa has got your back! Fully cooked and packed with flavor, just heat it, eat it, and wait for your tastebuds to thank you.

products.productTitle: ORGANIC NO SUGAR ADDED SMOKED SAUSAGE
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: ORGANIC PORK, WATER, ORGANIC SPICES (BLACK PEPPER, CELERY, CORIANDER), VINEGAR (MADE WITH ORGANIC INGREDIENTS), CULTURED CELERY POWDER, SEA SALT.
products.productDescription: Our Organic No Sugar Added Smoked Sausage is made from pork that is humanely raised without the use of antibiotics or growth stimulants and fed no animal by-products. Minimally processed, no preservatives, no artificial ingredients, no added nitrates or nitrites, no gluten, no lactose, no MSG, and no sweeteners!

products.productTitle: NO SUGAR ITALIAN GROUND SAUSAGE
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, SEASONING (SEA SALT, SPICES [ANISE, FENNEL, BLACK PEPPER, DEHYDRATED PARSLEY], GARLIC POWDER), LESS THAN 2% OF: VINEGAR, CELERY POWDER
products.productDescription: Ey, how you doin’? We’re pretty sure you’re going to be much better after getting your hands on our Whole30 Approved No Sugar Italian Ground Sausage. Bada bing, bada boom, do we have a treat for you! Bold, fresh, and full of flavor, we’re confident you won’t be able to fuggedaboutit once you’ve tried it. Capiche?

products.productTitle: NO SUGAR UNCURED BEEF HOT DOGS
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: BEEF, WATER, LESS THAN 2% OF: SALT, VINEGAR, CELERY POWDER, TAPIOCA STARCH, POTATO STARCH, NATURAL SPICES (INCLUDING PAPRIKA), NATURAL FLAVORS.
products.productDescription: Let’s be frank, hot dogs are the perfect meal for everyone. Kids love them, dads love to grill them, and, now, moms love the fact that they can feel good about feeding their families our all natural, 100% beef hot dogs because they contain NO ADDED SUGAR! These Whole 30 Compliant No Sugar Hot Dogs are quick and easy to prepare and give you the perfect emergency protein boost you’re looking for! Paleo friendly and Whole30 Approved.

products.productTitle: UNCURED NO SUGAR BONELESS HAM HALF - SPIRAL SLICED
products.ingredientsText: INGREDIENTS: PORK, WATER, VINEGAR, LESS THAN 2% OF: SEASONING (NATURAL SPICE EXTRACTIVES [INCLUDING CHILI PEPPERS, NATURAL FLAVORS]), CELERY POWDER, SALT INCLUDING SEA SALT.
products.productDescription: Sing it with me, now, “I like pig butts, and I cannot lie!” Okay, okay… we’ll stop hamming around! Our Uncured No Sugar Boneless Half Ham is about to revolutionize your holidays. It’s the same superior taste and quality that you’ve come to expect from Pederson’s Natural Farms and their No Sugar Line. Spiral Sliced. Boneless. Average weight is 4-6 lbs. Fully cooked.
